meta.title: Muthukrishnan Bommiah | Executive Director, Principal Architect Cloud Data and AI
meta.description: Portfolio for a seasoned technology leader specializing in designing and delivering cutting-edge cloud, data, and AI solutions that propel organizations forward.

personal.name: Muthukrishnan Bommiah
personal.title: Executive Director, Principal Architect Cloud Data and AI

about.bio: My career has been driven by a passion for solving complex puzzlesâ€”viewing technology not just as a tool, but as a way to bring order, create efficiency, and unlock human potential. I lead with a philosophy of 'Extreme Ownership,' taking full responsibility for outcomes and empowering my teams to do the same. This approach was critical when we launched the company's first Generative AI use case, where we took on the challenge and improved employee productivity by over 30%. I focus on building the intelligent, data-driven foundations that transform technology from a support function into a core driver of business strategy and innovation
focus: Designing and implementing comprehensive Data and AI architecture frameworks for multi-cloud and hybrid-cloud strategies.
Architecting and deploying end-to-end AI solutions on cloud platforms like GCP to drive business productivity and cost savings.
Leading large-scale modernization initiatives, including migration to GCP, and developing enterprise data platforms to align with business objectives.

experience.title: Executive Director, Principal Architect Cloud Data and Al
experience.description: A transformational leader designing and implementing comprehensive Data and AI architecture frameworks to drive business growth through technology innovation. Serving as a strategic advisor to senior leadership on enterprise architecture, Data and AI strategy, and engineering leadership, with a proven track record of leading large-scale modernization initiatives and transforming customer experience through advanced analytics and artificial intelligence.
achievements: Architected bank's foundational framework for Generative and Agentic AI, launching the AI-Augmented SDLC to enhance inner-loop developer productivity and outer-loop CI/CD pipelines; this strategy established a roadmap for AI-augmented observability and service management, unlocking a 30% productivity gain.

Developed and evangelized prescriptive Cloud Data and AI archetypes that became integral to GCP and Microsoft Azure product development, providing a common framework that unified and accelerated delivery of business solutions across the organization.

As the Portofolio architect for the Customer Analytics Portfolio, I transformed the customer experience by developing the target state for customer analytics in the cloud and delivering the first application on Google BigQuery with confidential data for advanced machine learning.

experience.title: Staff Engineer, Data and Analytics Platform
experience.description: Spearheaded the design and maintenance of large-scale cloud-native data and analytics platforms, driving transformative modernization, performance enhancements, and cost reductions. Led modernization efforts, developed cutting-edge machine learning platforms, and implemented robust continuous delivery pipelines, resulting in a 45% reduction in data processing time and a 25% increase in system uptime.
achievements: Implemented continuous delivery principles, reducing machine learning deployment time from 8 weeks to under 1 week.
Engineered data movement pipelines processing over 25 billion records per day and moving over 500 TB of data to AWS S3 with an automated governance framework.
Modernized data platforms to achieve 20X improved scalability and a 10X reduction in latency.

experience.title: Lead Software Engineer, Data and Analytics Platform
experience.description: Designed and implemented a unified ML platform using Domino Data Science Platform, accelerating research and improving the model lifecycle. Architected cloud-native ML systems with microservices, developed a single-click model deployment console, and commoditized AWS compute deployments for data scientists across the enterprise.
achievements: Designed and implemented the Model Deploy Console, providing single-click model deployment from Domino to OpenShift Container Platform and Airflow.
Influenced enterprise-wide decisions for the analytics community by helping develop new standards and setting the strategic direction for data science IT platforms.
Served as the Technical SME and application owner for numerous tools, including Domino, SAS, Spark, Airflow, and various development paradigms.

experience.title: IT Technical Manager, Middleware Platforms
experience.description: As a technical leader, managed a team of 12 members responsible for hosting and administering applications including WebSphere, SAS, Tibco, Tableau, and Linux Servers[cite: 89]. [cite_start]Created a strategic vision for the web application team and managed project resources to reduce operational costs without affecting SLAs[cite: 90].
achievements: Designed and developed a Single Sign-On (SSO) solution across multiple applications, resulting in a 30% reduction in login times and a 25% increase in user adoption[cite: 94].
Managed a Tibco upgrade, resulting in a 40% reduction in data processing time and a 20% increase in system uptime[cite: 95].
Supervised the migration of WebSphere Application Server, resulting in a 30% reduction in IT costs and a 20% increase in system efficiency[cite: 97].

experience.title: Lead System Administrator, Middleware Platforms
experience.description: Installed and configured monitoring tools like Zabbix and SiteScope for application and server monitoring[cite: 104]. [cite_start]Designed and implemented security infrastructure for web applications, including global security and SSO with SiteMinder[cite: 105].
achievements: Enhanced security by implementing a new infrastructure that led to a 30% reduction in security breaches and a 20% increase in customer trust[cite: 105].
Improved customer experience by working with deployment teams to troubleshoot production issues, resulting in a 25% increase in customer satisfaction[cite: 107].
Reduced application downtime by 25% and increased system performance by 15% through the implementation of new monitoring tools[cite: 104].

education.degree: Master of Science in Computer Science
Bachelor of Engineering in Electronics and Communication
